text: Brigid Jepchirchir Kosgei (born 20 February 1994) is a Kenyan marathon runner. She won the 2018 and 2019 Chicago Marathons and the 2019 and 2020 London Marathons. In 2021, she won a silver medal at the Tokyo Olympics. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:Olympic medalists for Kenya Category:Kenyan long- distance runners Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics
title: Brigid Kosgei
